alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Harrison; Perry (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 2:49PM EDT until July 02 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Harrison County in south central Indiana... Southeastern Crawford County in south central Indiana... Northeastern Perry County in south central Indiana... North central Meade County in central Kentucky... * Until 315 PM EDT/215 PM CDT/. * At 248 PM EDT/148 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles west of Carefree Town, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carefree Town, Milltown, Leavenworth, Oriole, Moberly, Fredonia, Beechwood, White Cloud, West Fork and Switzer Crossroads. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
